zserio.runtime.io

Interface BitStreamReader

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.io.Closeable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ByteArrayBitStreamReader, ValidationBitStreamReader

    public interface BitStreamReader
extends java.io.Closeable
    An interface for a bit stream reader implementation.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void alignTo(int alignVal)
      Aligns the bit position according to the aligning value.
      long getBitPosition()
      Gets the current bit position.
      long getBufferBitSize()
      Gets size of the underlying buffer in bits.
      int getBytePosition()
      Gets the current byte position.
      java.math.BigInteger readBigInteger(int numBits)
      Reads the next unsigned Big Integer value with containing numBits bits.
      BitBuffer readBitBuffer()
      Reads a bit buffer from the bit stream.
      long readBits(int numBits)
      Reads the next numBits of the bit stream as long value.
      boolean readBool()
      Reads a Boolean value from the bit stream.

      Reads the next signed byte (8 bits).

      long readSignedBits(int numBits)
      Reads the next numBits as signed bit value.

      Reads a Zserio string from the bit stream assuming it is encoded in UTF-8.

      Reads the next unsigned byte (8 bits) as short value.

      Read the next unsigned short (16 bits) as int value.

      • readVarInt

        long readVarInt()
         throws java.io.IOException
        Reads a signed variable integer from the bit stream. The integer takes up to 9 bytes to cover range <-2^63, 2^63-1>.
        Returns:
        Read signed VarInt value.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If reading failed.

      • readVarUInt

        java.math.BigInteger readVarUInt()
                          throws java.io.IOException
        Reads an unsigned variable integer from the bit stream. The integer takes up to 9 bytes to cover range <0, 2^64-1>.
        Returns:
        Read unsigned VarUInt value.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If reading failed.

      throws java.io.IOException
        Aligns the bit position according to the aligning value.
        Parameters:
        alignVal - An aligning value to use.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If the alignment failed.
